title: Bounce Competition - Day 14
text:
School work and studying got you down? Here's your chance to Bounce back!

Young Post and Bounce are teaming up to offer YP readers an exciting day at the trampoline park!

To win an exclusive spot at this one-of-a-kind high-flying party, log on and enter our caption contest.

From today to Friday November 6th, we'll post a photo on our website everyday at 4.30pm.

The first 20 Hong Kong based secondary students to comment with a caption for that photo will win ONE PAIR of tickets to our Bounce event on November 14.

You only get TWO tickets for each entry, so don't forget to invite your friends to enter!

Terms and Conditions
description: Win an hour of trampoline fun at Bounce with Young Post's photo caption contest!
